name: Adults who reported frequency of live contact of children with their teachers in person, by phone, or by video in the past week, by selected adult characteristics: 16−28 September 2020
description: Adults who reported frequency of live contact of children with their teachers in person, by phone, or by video in the past week, by selected adult characteristics: 16−28 September 2020

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_frequency_of_live_contact_of_children_with_their_teachers_in_person_by_phone_or_by_video_in_the_past_week_none
variableMeasured.description: Frequency Of Live Contact Of Children With Their Teachers In Person By Phone Or By Video In The Past Week None

variableMeasured.name: field_frequency_of_live_contact_of_children_with_their_teachers_in_person_by_phone_or_by_video_in_the_past_week_1_day
variableMeasured.description: Frequency Of Live Contact Of Children With Their Teachers In Person By Phone Or By Video In The Past Week 1 Day

variableMeasured.name: field_frequency_of_live_contact_of_children_with_their_teachers_in_person_by_phone_or_by_video_in_the_past_week_2_3_days
variableMeasured.description: Frequency Of Live Contact Of Children With Their Teachers In Person By Phone Or By Video In The Past Week 2 3 Days

variableMeasured.name: field_frequency_of_live_contact_of_children_with_their_teachers_in_person_by_phone_or_by_video_in_the_past_week_4_or_more_days
variableMeasured.description: Frequency Of Live Contact Of Children With Their Teachers In Person By Phone Or By Video In The Past Week 4 Or More Days

notes: The table includes adults 18 years and older in households with children enrolled in K−12 school. Adults in households with only homeschooled children are not included. Percentages may not add to 100% because of rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, special tabulations (2020) of the 2020 U.S. Census Bureau Household Pulse Survey. Science and Engineering Indicators
